text:
2022-2024 Richmond Terrace, south side, west from Park Avenue to Richmond Avenue. The frame building with the colonnade is the Old St. James Hotel, where Aaron Burr, Vice President of the United States under Jefferson, died in 1836.

July 29, 1929.
P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Park Avenue

text:
Richmond Terrace, north side, between Richmond Avenue and Park Avenue, showing the entrance to the Port Richmond-Bayonne (N.J.) Ferry

April 10, 1930

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Richmond Avenue
